parameters.command: curl -s --unix-socket /var/run/docker.sock 'http://localhost/containers/json?filters=%7B%22name%22%3A%5B%22media-download-gluetun%22%5D%7D' | python3 -c "import sys, json; containers = json.load(sys.stdin); status = containers[0]['Status'] if containers else ''; print('healthy' if '(healthy)' in status else 'unhealthy' if containers else 'not-found')"

curl -s --unix-socket /var/run/docker.sock 'http://localhost/containers/json?all=true&filters=%7B%22name%22%3A%5B%22media-download-nzbget%22%2C%22media-download-qbittorrent%22%2C%22media-download-slskd%22%5D%7D' | python3 -c "import sys, json; containers = json.load(sys.stdin); [print(f'{c["Names"][0].lstrip("/")}|{c["Status"]}|{c["State"]}') for c in containers]"

curl -s --unix-socket /var/run/docker.sock 'http://localhost/containers/{{ $json.container_name }}/json' | python3 -c "import sys, json; c = json.load(sys.stdin); print(c.get('State', {}).get('Status', 'unknown'))"
